price: او څوك چې د الله او د هغه د رسول امر ومني، له الله وېره وكړي او ځان ترې وساتي نو هماغه خلك بريالي دي.
arabic: وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَخۡشَ ٱللَّهَ وَيَتَّقۡهِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waman yuṭiʿi al-laha warasūlahu wayakhsha al-laha wayattaqhi fa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
